content: SB 6-22 Deep cut band saw Deep cut dual trigger band saw for precise, low-noise and virtually spark-free cuts through metal up to 127 mm│5” cutting depth (Nuron battery platform) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Saws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Deep cut band saw with advanced safety features – the extra cutting depth gives you a portable solution for even more metal/plastic sawing tasks, while the dual trigger design requires two-handed operation to better avoid accidents Cut in any conditions – with virtually no sparks, debris and noise, portable deep cut band saws give you a safer way to cut in occupied buildings or other sensitive environments High performance, low maintenance – the brushless motor delivers long-lasting power, while the keyless adjustable cutting shoe keeps you in control when slicing through larger objects Five speeds for efficiency and comfort – cut metal pipe, strut, threaded rod, or conduit with Hilti’s wide variety of easy-to-change, high quality band saw blades On the Nuron battery platform – cordless tools without compromise thanks to longer-lasting batteries, energy-saving blades and a range of services to keep you more productive, today and tomorrow Applications Cutting plastic pipes Cutting metal strut, pipes and threaded rod (max. cutting depth 5”) Cutting 4.5” metal pipes Cutting 1 and 2 EMT pipes Cutting 1-5/8” MQ strut channels ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base material: Metal, Stainless steel, Cast iron, Aluminium, Carbon steel Blade Dimensions (LxWxH): 44.882 x 0.488 x 0.02 in Maximum cutting capacity: 5 in Technical Data | Base material | Metal, Stainless steel, Cast iron, Aluminium, Carbon steel | Tool body weight | 13.9 lb ### ITEMS- 3895584 -
